name: Global Server Monitoring
overview:
Global Server Monitoring is a powerful dedicated service that enables server and website administrators to check the performance of websites, application servers, databases and mail servers. Global server monitoring is a perfect solution to analyze whether the website is up or down and its integrated keyword check ensures that the right content is displayed everytime.

Key Features

â€¢ Multi Location Monitoring: Global server monitoring can be setup from one or multiple locations. In-case the service from one of the chosen locations is not available the users receive an instant alert. â€¢ Email/SMS Notification: The service can be easily configured to receive email or/and SMS alerts for the specific error messages. â€¢ User Management: Administrators can configure alert messages for different users by simply selecting a check and the users who will receive the appropriate alert messages for that check. â€¢ False Alert Management: To minimize the number of false alerts in the case of failure, each check is also performed from a secondary server in a different location. â€¢ Statistics and Reports: The admin area of Global Server Monitoring provides in-depth statistics for each location and it also delivers a weekly email report to the subscribed users. â€¢ Instant Setup: The setup of website monitoring takes just one minute and provides advanced configuration options for web-masters and computer experts. For persons who are not tech-savvy, the default settings are applicable.

Using the Global Server Monitoring Software, the following checks can be conducted:

â€¢ Website: Web-Check, Login Check â€¢ Server: Ping Check, SSH Check, FTP Check and Port Check â€¢ Mail server: SMTP Check, POP3 Check, IMAP Check â€¢ Database: MySQL, PostGreSQL, MSSQL
